mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_QUESTION_BOARD( QUESTION_NUMBER , QUESTION_USER , QUESTION_TITLE , QUESTION_CONTENT , QUESTION_REGDATE) VALUES(QUESTION_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{questionUser} , #{questionTitle} , #{questionContent} , SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT RN as rowNumber , QUESTION_NUMBER , QUESTION_USER , QUESTION_TITLE , QUESTION_CONTENT , QUESTION_REGDATE , QUESTION_MODIFY_REGDATE , QUESTION_DELETE_CHECK FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , QUESTION_NUMBER , QUESTION_USER , QUESTION_TITLE , QUESTION_CONTENT , QUESTION_REGDATE , QUESTION_MODIFY_REGDATE , QUESTION_DELETE_CHECK FROM SHOPPING_QUESTION_BOARD WHERE QUESTION_DELETE_CHECK = 'N' ORDER BY QUESTION_NUMBER DESC ) WHERE QUESTION_NUMBER = #{questionNumber}

SELECT QUESTION_NUMBER , QUESTION_USER , QUESTION_TITLE , QUESTION_CONTENT , QUESTION_REGDATE , NVL(QUESTION_MODIFY_REGDATE, QUESTION_REGDATE) as questionModityRegdate , QUESTION_DELETE_CHECK FROM SHOPPING_QUESTION_BOARD WHERE QUESTION_DELETE_CHECK = 'N' ORDER BY QUESTION_NUMBER ASC
